tweet.text: Gorbachev remarked: “As we see it, long-held dislikes have been weakened; habitual stereotypes stemming from enemy images have been shaken loose. The human features of the other nation are now more clearly visible.” See remarks @Reagan_Library https://t.co/gJtPjNJi9p
tweet.html: Gorbachev remarked: “As we see it, long-held dislikes have been weakened; habitual stereotypes stemming from enemy images have been shaken loose. The human features of the other nation are now more clearly visible.” See remarks @Reagan_Library go.usa.gov/xQBnu
